AI Description: R Snow is an R package that provides support for simple network of workstations (SNOW) parallel computing in R, allowing users to distribute and manage parallel computations across a cluster of machines.
Core Features: Support For Parallel Computing In R Using Simple Network Of Workstations (Snow), Ability To Distribute & Manage Computations Across A Cluster Of Machines, Facilitates Parallel Execution Of R Code For Improved Performance & Efficiency
